execution_plan.description: Aggregate new customers by month and country in the EU database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT date_trunc('month', customers.updated_at)::date AS s1__month, customers.country AS s1__country, COUNT(customers.id) AS s1__count FROM customers GROUP BY 1,2

execution_plan.description: Aggregate new customers by month and country in the US database and combine with EU aggregates to get total new customers per month per region.
execution_plan.query:
WITH eu AS (
  /* EU aggregated rows are provided via placeholders from step 1 */
  SELECT v.s1__month::date AS month, v.s1__country AS country, v.s1__count::bigint AS count
  FROM (VALUES
    ($step1.s1__month, $step1.s1__country, $step1.s1__count)
  ) AS v(s1__month, s1__country, s1__count)
),
us AS (
  SELECT date_trunc('month', customers.updated_at)::date AS s2__month, customers.country AS s2__country, COUNT(customers.id) AS s2__count
  FROM customers
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
  COALESCE(eu.month, us.s2__month) AS s2__month,
  COALESCE(eu.country, us.s2__country) AS s2__country,
  COALESCE(eu.count, 0) + COALESCE(us.s2__count, 0) AS s2__count
FROM eu
FULL OUTER JOIN us
  ON eu.month = us.s2__month AND eu.country = us.s2__country
